children.content: Should we use a single-page application or a web application?

children.name: User572905
children.content: What is the best way to learn a new programming language?

children.name: Anon245612
children.content: The best way to learn a new programming language is to ask questions and get answers from the community.

children.name: Paul Wattson
children.content: What about watching a video tutorial?

children.name: John Doe
children.content: How do you know if a program is correct?

children.name: User289001
children.content: You can check if a program is correct by running it and seeing if it prints the correct output

children.name: User467120
children.content: And if it doesn't, you can try to fix it

children.name: David Rath
children.content: Where do you get the most information about programming?
